title: GROW lettuce at home | How to grow lettuce at home

subtasks: Prepare the lettuce by cutting off the root end (5 cm)
Use toothpicks to prop the lettuce in a jar
Fill the jar with water and place the lettuce so it touches the water
Ensure the lettuce receives sufficient sunlight (near a sunny window)
Change the water every 1-2 days to maintain cleanliness
After 3 weeks, transplant the lettuce to soil when leaves are big and green
Plant the lettuce in soil, making a hole and gently compressing the soil around it
Water the newly planted lettuce to keep soil moist
Squeeze the juice from one lime
Mix the lime juice with olive oil, vegetable broth, and pepper
Taste and adjust seasoning as needed
